```{r}
library(ISLR)
library(caret)
set.seed(2) # this is added so that the random number generator is alwas giving the same split, which makes it easier to compare results for now.
df <- read.csv("../../DataSources/Dataset_Graphs/RQ2_Content_Engagement/engagement_with_sentiment.csv", header=TRUE)
df$X <- NULL
df$quantiles  <- as.factor(df$quantiles)
df$urls_Binary  <- as.factor(df$urls_Binary)
df$media_photo_Binary  <- as.factor(df$media_photo_Binary)
df$media_videos_Binary  <- as.factor(df$media_videos_Binary)
df$hashtags_Binary  <- as.factor(df$hashtags_Binary)
inTrain <- createDataPartition(df$quantiles, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)

training_set <- df[inTrain, ]
test_set <- df[-inTrain, ]
training_set
```

```{r}
model <- glm(quantiles ~.,family=binomial(link='logit'),data=training_set)
summary(model)
```
